content: When States control things that can affect another State is why we NEED Federal laws or Regulations to even the playing field and have common guidelines. Some States do a great job, while others eager for income let companies do almost anything taking dangerous shortcuts that endanger everyone. Fracking operations are dangerous and growing in use. Where ever thy are wells have been contaminated and in some places cause an increase in earthquakes. I am not saying it cannot be done safely. However, caution to extreme caution needs to taken where and how done.
